when.test: searchType == 'cardNo' and searchKeyword != null and searchKeyword != ''

choose.when: SELECT MBR_ID FROM MART_CARD_MST WHERE CARD_NO = #{searchKeyword}

when.test: searchType == 'ocbcomLgnId' and searchKeyword != null and searchKeyword != ''

choose.when: SELECT MBR_ID FROM MART_OCBCOM_MBR_MST WHERE LGN_ID = #{searchKeyword}

when.test: searchType == 'mbrId' and searchKeyword != null and searchKeyword != ''
searchType == 'cardNo' and searchKeyword != null and searchKeyword != ''

choose.when: AND A.MBR_ID = ( SELECT MBR_ID FROM MART_CARD_MST WHERE CARD_NO = #{searchKeyword} )

when.test: searchType == 'ocbcomLgnId' and searchKeyword != null and searchKeyword != ''

choose.when: AND A.MBR_ID = ( SELECT MBR_ID FROM MART_OCBCOM_MBR_MST WHERE LGN_ID = #{searchKeyword} )

mapper.select: SELECT MBR_KOR_NM FROM MART_MBR_ID_MST WHERE MBR_ID = #{mbrId}

SELECT (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'MBR_FG_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.MBR_FG_CD) AS MBR_FG_CD /* 회원구분 */ , (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'MBR_STS_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.MBR_STS_CD) AS MBR_STS_CD /* 회원상태 */ , A.MBR_ID /* MBR_ID */ , C.CI_NO /* CI */ , DECODE(D.PNT_EXTNCT_YN,'1','Y',DECODE(D.PNT_EXTNCT_YN,'2','N',DECODE(D.PNT_EXTNCT_YN,'Y','미입력','미상'))) AS PNT_EXTNCT_YN /* 포인트소멸여부 */ , DECODE(A.MBR_KOR_NM,NULL,A.MBR_KOR_NM,SUBSTR(A.MBR_KOR_NM,1,LENGTH(A.MBR_KOR_NM)-2)||'*'||SUBSTR(A.MBR_KOR_NM,LENGTH(A.MBR_KOR_NM),1)) AS MBR_KOR_NM /* 한글성명 */ , '****-**-**' AS LEGL_BTHDT /* 법정생년월일 */ , (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'GNDR_FG_CD' AND DTL_CD = D.LEGL_GNDR_FG_CD) AS LEGL_GNDR_FG_CD /* 법정성별 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(D.FST_CARD_RREG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FST_CARD_RREG_DT /* OCB최초 카드 본등록 일자 */ , DECODE(A.CLPHN_NO,NULL,A.CLPHN_NO,SUBSTR(A.CLPHN_NO,1,LENGTH(A.CLPHN_NO)-8)||'****'||SUBSTR(A.CLPHN_NO,LENGTH(A.CLPHN_NO)-3,4)) AS CLPHN_NO /* 휴대전화번호 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.CLPHN_NO_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CLPHN_NO_DT /* 휴대전화번호최종유입일자 */ , CASE WHEN E.MBR_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS CLPHN_NO_DUP_YN /* 휴대전화번호 중복여부 */ , DECODE(A.HOME_TEL_NO,NULL,A.HOME_TEL_NO,SUBSTR(A.HOME_TEL_NO,1,LENGTH(A.HOME_TEL_NO)-8)||'****'||SUBSTR(A.HOME_TEL_NO,LENGTH(A.HOME_TEL_NO)-3,4)) AS HOME_TEL_NO /* 자택전화번호 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.HOME_TEL_NO_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS HOME_TEL_NO_DT /* 자택전화번호 최종유입일자 */ , DECODE(A.JOBP_TEL_NO,NULL,A.JOBP_TEL_NO,SUBSTR(A.JOBP_TEL_NO,1,LENGTH(A.JOBP_TEL_NO)-8)||'****'||SUBSTR(A.JOBP_TEL_NO,LENGTH(A.JOBP_TEL_NO)-3,4)) AS JOBP_TEL_NO /* 직장전화번호 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.JOBP_TEL_NO_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOBP_TEL_NO_DT /* 직장전화번호 최종유입일자 */ , A.HOME_BASIC_ADDR /* 자택기본주소 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.HOME_BASIC_ADDR_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS HOME_BASIC_ADDR_DT /* 자택기본주소 최종유입일자 */ , A.HOME_DTL_ADDR /* 자택상세주소 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.HOME_DTL_ADDR_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS HOME_DTL_ADDR_DT /* 자택상세주소 최종유입일자 */ , DECODE(HOME_BASIC_ADDR,NULL,HOME_BASIC_ADDR, SUBSTR(HOME_BASIC_ADDR,1,LENGTH(HOME_BASIC_ADDR) - LENGTH(regexp_substr(HOME_BASIC_ADDR, '[^ ]+', 1, REGEXP_COUNT(HOME_BASIC_ADDR,' ')+1)) ) ||'***'|| SUBSTR(regexp_substr(HOME_BASIC_ADDR, '[^ ]+', 1, REGEXP_COUNT(HOME_BASIC_ADDR,' ')+1),LENGTH(regexp_substr(HOME_BASIC_ADDR, '[^ ]+', 1, REGEXP_COUNT(HOME_BASIC_ADDR,' ')+1)),1)) || ' ' || A.HOME_DTL_ADDR AS HOME_ADDR , A.JOBP_BASIC_ADDR /* 직장기본주소 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.JOBP_BASIC_ADDR_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOBP_BASIC_ADDR_DT /* 직장기본주소 최종유입일자 */ , A.JOBP_DTL_ADDR /* 직장상세주소 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.JOBP_DTL_ADDR_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOBP_DTL_ADDR_DT /* 직장상세주소 최종유입일자 */ , DECODE(JOBP_BASIC_ADDR,NULL,JOBP_BASIC_ADDR, SUBSTR(JOBP_BASIC_ADDR,1,LENGTH(JOBP_BASIC_ADDR) - LENGTH(regexp_substr(JOBP_BASIC_ADDR, '[^ ]+', 1, REGEXP_COUNT(JOBP_BASIC_ADDR,' ')+1)) ) ||'***'|| SUBSTR(regexp_substr(JOBP_BASIC_ADDR, '[^ ]+', 1, REGEXP_COUNT(JOBP_BASIC_ADDR,' ')+1),LENGTH(regexp_substr(JOBP_BASIC_ADDR, '[^ ]+', 1, REGEXP_COUNT(JOBP_BASIC_ADDR,' ')+1)),1)) || ' ' || A.JOBP_DTL_ADDR AS JOBP_ADDR , DECODE(A.EMAIL_ADDR,NULL,A.EMAIL_ADDR,SUBSTR(regexp_substr(A.EMAIL_ADDR, '[^@]+', 1, 1),1,LENGTH(regexp_substr(A.EMAIL_ADDR, '[^@]+', 1, 1))-2)||'**@'||regexp_substr(A.EMAIL_ADDR, '[^@]+', 1, 2)) AS EMAIL_ADDR /* 이메일주소 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.EMAIL_ADDR_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EMAIL_ADDR_DT /* 이메일주소 최종유입일자 */ , CASE WHEN F.MBR_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS EMAIL_ADDR_DUP_YN /* 이메일주소 중복 여부 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(D.DESTR_EXPCTN_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DESTR_EXPCTN_DT /* 개인정보 유효기간 만료 예정 일자 */ FROM DW_MBR_MST A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MBR_ID , MAX(DECODE(MBR_UPD_ITM_CD,'0121',UPD_DT)) CLPHN_NO_DT , MAX(DECODE(MBR_UPD_ITM_CD,'0112',UPD_DT)) HOME_TEL_NO_DT , MAX(DECODE(MBR_UPD_ITM_CD,'0119',UPD_DT)) JOBP_TEL_NO_DT , MAX(DECODE(MBR_UPD_ITM_CD,'0114',UPD_DT)) HOME_BASIC_ADDR_DT , MAX(DECODE(MBR_UPD_ITM_CD,'0115',UPD_DT)) HOME_DTL_ADDR_DT , MAX(DECODE(MBR_UPD_ITM_CD,'0117',UPD_DT)) JOBP_BASIC_ADDR_DT , MAX(DECODE(MBR_UPD_ITM_CD,'0118',UPD_DT)) JOBP_DTL_ADDR_DT , MAX(DECODE(MBR_UPD_ITM_CD,'0124',UPD_DT)) EMAIL_ADDR_DT FROM DW_MBR_UPD_HST WHERE MBR_UPD_ITM_CD IN ('0121','0112','0119','0114','0115','0117','0118','0124') GROUP BY MBR_ID ) B ON A.MBR_ID = B.MBR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN DW_MBR_CI_INFO C ON A.MBRSHP_PGM_ID = C.MBRSHP_PGM_ID AND A.MBR_ID = C.MBR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MART_MBR_INQ_INFO D ON A.MBR_ID = D.MBR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MART_CLPHN_NO_DUP_INFO E ON A.MBR_ID = E.MBR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MART_EMAIL_ADDR_DUP_INFO F ON A.MBR_ID = F.MBR_ID

SELECT (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'MBR_FG_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.MBR_FG_CD) AS MBR_FG_CD /* 회원구분 */ , (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'MBR_STS_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.MBR_STS_CD) AS MBR_STS_CD /* 회원상태 */ , A.MBR_ID /* MBR_ID */ , C.CI_NO /* CI */ , DECODE(D.PNT_EXTNCT_YN,'1','Y',DECODE(D.PNT_EXTNCT_YN,'2','N',DECODE(D.PNT_EXTNCT_YN,'Y','미입력','미상'))) AS PNT_EXTNCT_YN /* 포인트소멸여부 */ , DECODE(A.MBR_KOR_NM,NULL,A.MBR_KOR_NM,SUBSTR(A.MBR_KOR_NM,1,LENGTH(A.MBR_KOR_NM)-2)||'*'||SUBSTR(A.MBR_KOR_NM,LENGTH(A.MBR_KOR_NM),1)) AS MBR_KOR_NM /* 한글성명 */ , '****-**-**' AS LEGL_BTHDT /* 법정생년월일 */ , (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'GNDR_FG_CD' AND DTL_CD = D.LEGL_GNDR_FG_CD) AS LEGL_GNDR_FG_CD /* 법정성별 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(D.FST_CARD_RREG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FST_CARD_RREG_DT /* OCB최초 카드 본등록 일자 */ , A.CLPHN_NO /* 휴대전화번호 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.CLPHN_NO_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CLPHN_NO_DT /* 휴대전화번호최종유입일자 */ , CASE WHEN E.MBR_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS CLPHN_NO_DUP_YN /* 휴대전화번호 중복여부 */ , A.HOME_TEL_NO /* 자택전화번호 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.HOME_TEL_NO_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS HOME_TEL_NO_DT /* 자택전화번호 최종유입일자 */ , A.JOBP_TEL_NO /* 직장전화번호 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.JOBP_TEL_NO_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOBP_TEL_NO_DT /* 직장전화번호 최종유입일자 */ , A.HOME_BASIC_ADDR /* 자택기본주소 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.HOME_BASIC_ADDR_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS HOME_BASIC_ADDR_DT /* 자택기본주소 최종유입일자 */ , A.HOME_DTL_ADDR /* 자택상세주소 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.HOME_DTL_ADDR_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS HOME_DTL_ADDR_DT /* 자택상세주소 최종유입일자 */ , HOME_BASIC_ADDR || ' ' || A.HOME_DTL_ADDR AS HOME_ADDR , A.JOBP_BASIC_ADDR /* 직장기본주소 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.JOBP_BASIC_ADDR_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOBP_BASIC_ADDR_DT /* 직장기본주소 최종유입일자 */ , A.JOBP_DTL_ADDR /* 직장상세주소 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.JOBP_DTL_ADDR_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOBP_DTL_ADDR_DT /* 직장상세주소 최종유입일자 */ , JOBP_BASIC_ADDR || ' ' || A.JOBP_DTL_ADDR AS JOBP_ADDR , A.EMAIL_ADDR /* 이메일주소 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.EMAIL_ADDR_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EMAIL_ADDR_DT /* 이메일주소 최종유입일자 */ , CASE WHEN F.MBR_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS EMAIL_ADDR_DUP_YN /* 이메일주소 중복 여부 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(D.DESTR_EXPCTN_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DESTR_EXPCTN_DT /* 개인정보 유효기간 만료 예정 일자 */ FROM DW_MBR_MST A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MBR_ID , MAX(DECODE(MBR_UPD_ITM_CD,'0121',UPD_DT)) CLPHN_NO_DT , MAX(DECODE(MBR_UPD_ITM_CD,'0112',UPD_DT)) HOME_TEL_NO_DT , MAX(DECODE(MBR_UPD_ITM_CD,'0119',UPD_DT)) JOBP_TEL_NO_DT , MAX(DECODE(MBR_UPD_ITM_CD,'0114',UPD_DT)) HOME_BASIC_ADDR_DT , MAX(DECODE(MBR_UPD_ITM_CD,'0115',UPD_DT)) HOME_DTL_ADDR_DT , MAX(DECODE(MBR_UPD_ITM_CD,'0117',UPD_DT)) JOBP_BASIC_ADDR_DT , MAX(DECODE(MBR_UPD_ITM_CD,'0118',UPD_DT)) JOBP_DTL_ADDR_DT , MAX(DECODE(MBR_UPD_ITM_CD,'0124',UPD_DT)) EMAIL_ADDR_DT FROM DW_MBR_UPD_HST WHERE MBR_UPD_ITM_CD IN ('0121','0112','0119','0114','0115','0117','0118','0124') GROUP BY MBR_ID ) B ON A.MBR_ID = B.MBR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN DW_MBR_CI_INFO C ON A.MBRSHP_PGM_ID = C.MBRSHP_PGM_ID AND A.MBR_ID = C.MBR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MART_MBR_INQ_INFO D ON A.MBR_ID = D.MBR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MART_CLPHN_NO_DUP_INFO E ON A.MBR_ID = E.MBR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MART_EMAIL_ADDR_DUP_INFO F ON A.MBR_ID = F.MBR_ID

SELECT UNITED_ID /* okcashbag.com United ID */ , DECODE(LGN_ID,NULL,LGN_ID,SUBSTR(LGN_ID,1,LENGTH(LGN_ID)-2)||'**') AS LGN_ID /* okcashbag.com 로그인 ID 목록 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ENTR_DTTM, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ENTR_DTTM /* okcashbag.com 로그인 ID 별 가입 일자 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(FNL_LGN_DTTM, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_LGN_DTTM /* okcashbag.com 로그인 ID 최종 로그인 일자 */ FROM MART_OCBCOM_MBR_MST A

SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(FNL_ERNG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FNL_ERNG_DT /* OCB 적립/사용/할인/현금환급 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(FNL_CARD_RREG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FNL_CARD_RREG_DT /* OCB 카드 본등록 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(FNL_CNSOF_ENQ_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FNL_CNSOF_ENQ_DT /* 상담실 문의 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(FNL_PRD_PCHS_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FNL_PRD_PCHS_DT /* 상품 구매 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(FNL_PNT_INQ_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FNL_PNT_INQ_DT /* 포인트 조회 */ FROM MART_MBR_INQ_INFO A

SELECT A.MBR_ID , A.MBR_KOR_NM /* 한글성명 */ , DECODE(A.CLPHN_NO,NULL,A.CLPHN_NO,SUBSTR(A.CLPHN_NO,1,LENGTH(A.CLPHN_NO)-8)||'****'||SUBSTR(A.CLPHN_NO,LENGTH(A.CLPHN_NO)-3,4)) AS CLPHN_NO /* 휴대전화번호 */ , A.CLPHN_NO_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD /* 휴대전화번호 최종 유입 출처 코드 */ , A.CLPHN_NO_FNL_INFL_DT /* 휴대전화번호 최종 유입 일자 */ , A.CLPHN_NO_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD || ' / ' || (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'ORG_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.CLPHN_NO_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD) || ' / ' || TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.CLPHN_NO_FNL_INFL_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CLPHN_NO_FNL_INFL , CASE WHEN B.MBR_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS CLPHN_NO_DUP_YN /* 휴대전화번호 중복 여부 */ , DECODE(A.HOME_TEL_NO,NULL,A.HOME_TEL_NO,SUBSTR(A.HOME_TEL_NO,1,LENGTH(A.HOME_TEL_NO)-8)||'****'||SUBSTR(A.HOME_TEL_NO,LENGTH(A.HOME_TEL_NO)-3,4)) AS HOME_TEL_NO /* 자택전화번호 */ , A.HOME_TEL_NO_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD /* 자택전화번호 최종 유입 출처 코드 */ , A.HOME_TEL_NO_FNL_INFL_DT /* 자택전화번호 최종 유입 출처일자 */ , A.HOME_TEL_NO_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD || ' / ' || (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'ORG_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.HOME_TEL_NO_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD) || ' / ' || TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.HOME_TEL_NO_FNL_INFL_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS HOME_TEL_NO_FNL_INFL , DECODE(A.JOBP_TEL_NO,NULL,A.JOBP_TEL_NO,SUBSTR(A.JOBP_TEL_NO,1,LENGTH(A.JOBP_TEL_NO)-8)||'****'||SUBSTR(A.JOBP_TEL_NO,LENGTH(A.JOBP_TEL_NO)-3,4)) AS JOBP_TEL_NO /* 직장전화번호 */ , A.JOBP_TEL_NO_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD /* 직장전화번호 최종 유입 출처코드 */ , A.JOBP_TEL_NO_FNL_INFL_DT /* 직장전화번호 최종 유입일자 */ , A.JOBP_TEL_NO_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD || ' / ' || (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'ORG_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.JOBP_TEL_NO_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD) || ' / ' || TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.JOBP_TEL_NO_FNL_INFL_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOBP_TEL_NO_FNL_INFL , A.HOME_ZIPCD || ' ' || DECODE(HOME_BASIC_ADDR,NULL,HOME_BASIC_ADDR, SUBSTR(HOME_BASIC_ADDR,1,LENGTH(HOME_BASIC_ADDR) - LENGTH(regexp_substr(HOME_BASIC_ADDR, '[^ ]+', 1, REGEXP_COUNT(HOME_BASIC_ADDR,' ')+1)) ) ||'***'|| SUBSTR(regexp_substr(HOME_BASIC_ADDR, '[^ ]+', 1, REGEXP_COUNT(HOME_BASIC_ADDR,' ')+1),LENGTH(regexp_substr(HOME_BASIC_ADDR, '[^ ]+', 1, REGEXP_COUNT(HOME_BASIC_ADDR,' ')+1)),1)) || ' ' || HOME_DTL_ADDR AS HOME_ADDR /* 자택주소 */ , A.HOME_ADDR_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD /* 자택주소 최종 유입 출처 코드 */ , A.HOME_ADDR_FNL_INFL_DT /* 자택주소 최종유입일자 */ , A.HOME_ADDR_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD || ' / ' || (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'ORG_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.HOME_ADDR_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD) || ' / ' || TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.HOME_ADDR_FNL_INFL_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS HOME_ADDR_FNL_INFL , A.JOBP_ZIPCD || ' ' || DECODE(JOBP_BASIC_ADDR,NULL,JOBP_BASIC_ADDR, SUBSTR(JOBP_BASIC_ADDR,1,LENGTH(JOBP_BASIC_ADDR) - LENGTH(regexp_substr(JOBP_BASIC_ADDR, '[^ ]+', 1, REGEXP_COUNT(JOBP_BASIC_ADDR,' ')+1)) ) ||'***'|| SUBSTR(regexp_substr(JOBP_BASIC_ADDR, '[^ ]+', 1, REGEXP_COUNT(JOBP_BASIC_ADDR,' ')+1),LENGTH(regexp_substr(JOBP_BASIC_ADDR, '[^ ]+', 1, REGEXP_COUNT(JOBP_BASIC_ADDR,' ')+1)),1)) || ' ' || JOBP_DTL_ADDR AS JOBP_ADDR /* 직장주소 */ , A.JOBP_ADDR_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD /* 직장주소 최종 유입 출처 코드 */ , A.JOBP_ADDR_FNL_INFL_DT /* 직장주소 최종유입일자 */ , A.JOBP_ADDR_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD || ' / ' || (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'ORG_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.JOBP_ADDR_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD) || ' / ' || TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.JOBP_ADDR_FNL_INFL_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOBP_ADDR_FNL_INFL , DECODE(A.EMAIL_ADDR,NULL,A.EMAIL_ADDR,SUBSTR(regexp_substr(A.EMAIL_ADDR, '[^@]+', 1, 1),1,LENGTH(regexp_substr(A.EMAIL_ADDR, '[^@]+', 1, 1))-2)||'**@'||regexp_substr(A.EMAIL_ADDR, '[^@]+', 1, 2)) AS EMAIL_ADDR /* 이메일주소 */ , A.EMAIL_ADDR_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD /* 이메일주소 최종 유입 출처 코드*/ , A.EMAIL_ADDR_FNL_INFL_DT /* 이메일주소 최종 유입일자 */ , A.EMAIL_ADDR_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD || ' / ' || (SELECT DTL_CD NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'ORG_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.EMAIL_ADDR_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD) || ' / ' || TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.EMAIL_ADDR_FNL_INFL_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EMAIL_ADDR_FNL_INFL , CASE WHEN C.MBR_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS EMAIL_ADDR_DUP_YN /* 이메일주소 중복 여부 */ FROM MART_MKTNG_MBR_MST A LEFT OUTER JOIN MART_MKTNG_CLPHN_NO_DUP_INFO B ON A.MBR_ID = B.MBR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MART_MKTNG_EMAIL_ADDR_DUP_INFO C ON A.MBR_ID = C.MBR_ID

SELECT A.MBR_ID , A.MBR_KOR_NM /* 한글성명 */ , DECODE(A.CLPHN_NO,NULL,A.CLPHN_NO,SUBSTR(A.CLPHN_NO,1,LENGTH(A.CLPHN_NO)-8)||'****'||SUBSTR(A.CLPHN_NO,LENGTH(A.CLPHN_NO)-3,4)) AS CLPHN_NO /* 휴대전화번호 */ , A.CLPHN_NO_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD /* 휴대전화번호 최종 유입 출처 코드 */ , A.CLPHN_NO_FNL_INFL_DT /* 휴대전화번호 최종 유입 일자 */ , A.CLPHN_NO_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD || ' / ' || (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'ORG_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.CLPHN_NO_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD) || ' / ' || TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.CLPHN_NO_FNL_INFL_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CLPHN_NO_FNL_INFL , CASE WHEN B.MBR_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS CLPHN_NO_DUP_YN /* 휴대전화번호 중복 여부 */ , DECODE(A.HOME_TEL_NO,NULL,A.HOME_TEL_NO,SUBSTR(A.HOME_TEL_NO,1,LENGTH(A.HOME_TEL_NO)-8)||'****'||SUBSTR(A.HOME_TEL_NO,LENGTH(A.HOME_TEL_NO)-3,4)) AS HOME_TEL_NO /* 자택전화번호 */ , A.HOME_TEL_NO_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD /* 자택전화번호 최종 유입 출처 코드 */ , A.HOME_TEL_NO_FNL_INFL_DT /* 자택전화번호 최종 유입 출처일자 */ , A.HOME_TEL_NO_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD || ' / ' || (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'ORG_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.HOME_TEL_NO_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD) || ' / ' || TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.HOME_TEL_NO_FNL_INFL_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS HOME_TEL_NO_FNL_INFL , DECODE(A.JOBP_TEL_NO,NULL,A.JOBP_TEL_NO,SUBSTR(A.JOBP_TEL_NO,1,LENGTH(A.JOBP_TEL_NO)-8)||'****'||SUBSTR(A.JOBP_TEL_NO,LENGTH(A.JOBP_TEL_NO)-3,4)) AS JOBP_TEL_NO /* 직장전화번호 */ , A.JOBP_TEL_NO_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD /* 직장전화번호 최종 유입 출처코드 */ , A.JOBP_TEL_NO_FNL_INFL_DT /* 직장전화번호 최종 유입일자 */ , A.JOBP_TEL_NO_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD || ' / ' || (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'ORG_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.JOBP_TEL_NO_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD) || ' / ' || TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.JOBP_TEL_NO_FNL_INFL_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOBP_TEL_NO_FNL_INFL , A.HOME_ZIPCD || ' ' || HOME_BASIC_ADDR || ' ' || HOME_DTL_ADDR AS HOME_ADDR /* 자택주소 */ , A.HOME_ADDR_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD /* 자택주소 최종 유입 출처 코드 */ , A.HOME_ADDR_FNL_INFL_DT /* 자택주소 최종유입일자 */ , A.HOME_ADDR_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD || ' / ' || (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'ORG_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.HOME_ADDR_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD) || ' / ' || TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.HOME_ADDR_FNL_INFL_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS HOME_ADDR_FNL_INFL , A.JOBP_ZIPCD || ' ' || JOBP_BASIC_ADDR || ' ' || JOBP_DTL_ADDR AS JOBP_ADDR /* 직장주소 */ , A.JOBP_ADDR_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD /* 직장주소 최종 유입 출처 코드 */ , A.JOBP_ADDR_FNL_INFL_DT /* 직장주소 최종유입일자 */ , A.JOBP_ADDR_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD || ' / ' || (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'ORG_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.JOBP_ADDR_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD) || ' / ' || TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.JOBP_ADDR_FNL_INFL_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOBP_ADDR_FNL_INFL , A.EMAIL_ADDR /* 이메일주소 */ , A.EMAIL_ADDR_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD /* 이메일주소 최종 유입 출처 코드*/ , A.EMAIL_ADDR_FNL_INFL_DT /* 이메일주소 최종 유입일자 */ , A.EMAIL_ADDR_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD || ' / ' || (SELECT DTL_CD NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'ORG_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.EMAIL_ADDR_FNL_SRC_ORG_CD) || ' / ' || TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.EMAIL_ADDR_FNL_INFL_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EMAIL_ADDR_FNL_INFL , CASE WHEN C.MBR_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS EMAIL_ADDR_DUP_YN /* 이메일주소 중복 여부 */ FROM MART_MKTNG_MBR_MST A LEFT OUTER JOIN MART_MKTNG_CLPHN_NO_DUP_INFO B ON A.MBR_ID = B.MBR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MART_MKTNG_EMAIL_ADDR_DUP_INFO C ON A.MBR_ID = C.MBR_ID

SELECT A.DATA_SRC_ORG_CD /* 유입기관코드 */ , A.AGRMT_VER_CD /* 동의버전 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.AGRMT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS AGRMT_DT /* 동의일자 */ , DECODE(A.AGRMT_YN,'1','Y',DECODE(A.AGRMT_YN,'2','N',DECODE(A.AGRMT_YN,'Y','미입력','미상'))) AS AGRMT_YN /* 동의여부 */ , DECODE(B.MBR_KOR_NM,NULL,B.MBR_KOR_NM,SUBSTR(B.MBR_KOR_NM,1,LENGTH(B.MBR_KOR_NM)-2)||'*'||SUBSTR(B.MBR_KOR_NM,LENGTH(B.MBR_KOR_NM),1)) AS MBR_KOR_NM /* 한글성명 */ , '****-**-**' AS BTHDT /* 생년월일 */ , (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'GNDR_FG_CD' AND DTL_CD = B.GNDR_FG_CD) AS GNDR_FG_CD /* 성별 */ , DECODE(B.EMAIL_ADDR,NULL,B.EMAIL_ADDR,SUBSTR(regexp_substr(B.EMAIL_ADDR, '[^@]+', 1, 1),1,LENGTH(regexp_substr(B.EMAIL_ADDR, '[^@]+', 1, 1))-2)||'**@'||regexp_substr(B.EMAIL_ADDR, '[^@]+', 1, 2)) AS EMAIL_ADDR /* 이메일주소 */ , DECODE(B.CLPHN_NO,NULL,B.CLPHN_NO,SUBSTR(B.CLPHN_NO,1,LENGTH(B.CLPHN_NO)-8)||'****'||SUBSTR(B.CLPHN_NO,LENGTH(B.CLPHN_NO)-3,4)) AS CLPHN_NO /* 휴대전화번호 */ , DECODE(B.HOME_TEL_NO,NULL,B.HOME_TEL_NO,SUBSTR(B.HOME_TEL_NO,1,LENGTH(B.HOME_TEL_NO)-8)||'****'||SUBSTR(B.HOME_TEL_NO,LENGTH(B.HOME_TEL_NO)-3,4)) AS HOME_TEL_NO /* 자택전화번호 */ , DECODE(B.JOBP_TEL_NO,NULL,B.JOBP_TEL_NO,SUBSTR(B.JOBP_TEL_NO,1,LENGTH(B.JOBP_TEL_NO)-8)||'****'||SUBSTR(B.JOBP_TEL_NO,LENGTH(B.JOBP_TEL_NO)-3,4)) AS JOBP_TEL_NO /* 직장전화번호 */ FROM DW_MKTNG_AGRMT_MGMT_HST A JOIN DW_MKTNG_AGRMT_HST B ON A.CUST_REG_DT = B.CUST_REG_DT AND A.REG_NO = B.REG_NO
ORDER BY A.AGRMT_DT, A.AGRMT_TM

SELECT A.DATA_SRC_ORG_CD /* 유입기관코드 */ , A.AGRMT_VER_CD /* 동의버전 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.AGRMT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS AGRMT_DT /* 동의일자 */ , DECODE(A.AGRMT_YN,'1','Y',DECODE(A.AGRMT_YN,'2','N',DECODE(A.AGRMT_YN,'Y','미입력','미상'))) AS AGRMT_YN /* 동의여부 */ , DECODE(B.MBR_KOR_NM,NULL,B.MBR_KOR_NM,SUBSTR(B.MBR_KOR_NM,1,LENGTH(B.MBR_KOR_NM)-2)||'*'||SUBSTR(B.MBR_KOR_NM,LENGTH(B.MBR_KOR_NM),1)) AS MBR_KOR_NM /* 한글성명 */ , '****-**-**' AS BTHDT /* 생년월일 */ , (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'GNDR_FG_CD' AND DTL_CD = B.GNDR_FG_CD) AS GNDR_FG_CD /* 성별 */ , B.EMAIL_ADDR /* 이메일주소 */ , DECODE(B.CLPHN_NO,NULL,B.CLPHN_NO,SUBSTR(B.CLPHN_NO,1,LENGTH(B.CLPHN_NO)-8)||'****'||SUBSTR(B.CLPHN_NO,LENGTH(B.CLPHN_NO)-3,4)) AS CLPHN_NO /* 휴대전화번호 */ , DECODE(B.HOME_TEL_NO,NULL,B.HOME_TEL_NO,SUBSTR(B.HOME_TEL_NO,1,LENGTH(B.HOME_TEL_NO)-8)||'****'||SUBSTR(B.HOME_TEL_NO,LENGTH(B.HOME_TEL_NO)-3,4)) AS HOME_TEL_NO /* 자택전화번호 */ , DECODE(B.JOBP_TEL_NO,NULL,B.JOBP_TEL_NO,SUBSTR(B.JOBP_TEL_NO,1,LENGTH(B.JOBP_TEL_NO)-8)||'****'||SUBSTR(B.JOBP_TEL_NO,LENGTH(B.JOBP_TEL_NO)-3,4)) AS JOBP_TEL_NO /* 직장전화번호 */ FROM DW_MKTNG_AGRMT_MGMT_HST A JOIN DW_MKTNG_AGRMT_HST B ON A.CUST_REG_DT = B.CUST_REG_DT AND A.REG_NO = B.REG_NO
ORDER BY A.AGRMT_DT, A.AGRMT_TM

SELECT '' AS DATA_DST_ORG_CD /* 제공대상기관 */ , A.DATA_SRC_ORG_CD /* 유입기관코드 */ , A.AGRMT_VER_CD /* 동의버전 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.AGRMT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS AGRMT_DT /* 동의일자 */ , DECODE(A.AGRMT_YN,'1','Y',DECODE(A.AGRMT_YN,'2','N',DECODE(A.AGRMT_YN,'Y','미입력','미상'))) AS AGRMT_YN /* 동의여부 */ , DECODE(B.MBR_KOR_NM,NULL,B.MBR_KOR_NM,SUBSTR(B.MBR_KOR_NM,1,LENGTH(B.MBR_KOR_NM)-2)||'*'||SUBSTR(B.MBR_KOR_NM,LENGTH(B.MBR_KOR_NM),1)) AS MBR_KOR_NM /* 한글성명 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.BTHDT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BTHDT /* 생년월일 */ , (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'GNDR_FG_CD' AND DTL_CD = B.GNDR_FG_CD) AS GNDR_FG_CD /* 성별 */ , DECODE(B.EMAIL_ADDR,NULL,B.EMAIL_ADDR,SUBSTR(regexp_substr(B.EMAIL_ADDR, '[^@]+', 1, 1),1,LENGTH(regexp_substr(B.EMAIL_ADDR, '[^@]+', 1, 1))-2)||'**@'||regexp_substr(B.EMAIL_ADDR, '[^@]+', 1, 2)) AS EMAIL_ADDR /* 이메일주소 */ , DECODE(B.CLPHN_NO,NULL,B.CLPHN_NO,SUBSTR(B.CLPHN_NO,1,LENGTH(B.CLPHN_NO)-8)||'****'||SUBSTR(B.CLPHN_NO,LENGTH(B.CLPHN_NO)-3,4)) AS CLPHN_NO /* 휴대전화번호 */ , DECODE(B.HOME_TEL_NO,NULL,B.HOME_TEL_NO,SUBSTR(B.HOME_TEL_NO,1,LENGTH(B.HOME_TEL_NO)-8)||'****'||SUBSTR(B.HOME_TEL_NO,LENGTH(B.HOME_TEL_NO)-3,4)) AS HOME_TEL_NO /* 자택전화번호 */ , DECODE(B.JOBP_TEL_NO,NULL,B.JOBP_TEL_NO,SUBSTR(B.JOBP_TEL_NO,1,LENGTH(B.JOBP_TEL_NO)-8)||'****'||SUBSTR(B.JOBP_TEL_NO,LENGTH(B.JOBP_TEL_NO)-3,4)) AS JOBP_TEL_NO /* 직장전화번호 */ FROM DW_THPT_MKTNG_AGRMT_MGMT_HST A JOIN DW_THPT_MKTNG_AGRMT_HST B ON A.CUST_REG_DT = B.CUST_REG_DT AND A.REG_NO = B.REG_NO
ORDER BY A.AGRMT_DT, A.AGRMT_TM

SELECT '' AS DATA_DST_ORG_CD /* 제공대상기관 */ , A.DATA_SRC_ORG_CD /* 유입기관코드 */ , A.AGRMT_VER_CD /* 동의버전 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.AGRMT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS AGRMT_DT /* 동의일자 */ , DECODE(A.AGRMT_YN,'1','Y',DECODE(A.AGRMT_YN,'2','N',DECODE(A.AGRMT_YN,'Y','미입력','미상'))) AS AGRMT_YN /* 동의여부 */ , DECODE(B.MBR_KOR_NM,NULL,B.MBR_KOR_NM,SUBSTR(B.MBR_KOR_NM,1,LENGTH(B.MBR_KOR_NM)-2)||'*'||SUBSTR(B.MBR_KOR_NM,LENGTH(B.MBR_KOR_NM),1)) AS MBR_KOR_NM /* 한글성명 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.BTHDT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BTHDT /* 생년월일 */ , (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'GNDR_FG_CD' AND DTL_CD = B.GNDR_FG_CD) AS GNDR_FG_CD /* 성별 */ , B.EMAIL_ADDR /* 이메일주소 */ , B.CLPHN_NO /* 휴대전화번호 */ , B.HOME_TEL_NO /* 자택전화번호 */ , B.JOBP_TEL_NO /* 직장전화번호 */ FROM DW_THPT_MKTNG_AGRMT_MGMT_HST A JOIN DW_THPT_MKTNG_AGRMT_HST B ON A.CUST_REG_DT = B.CUST_REG_DT AND A.REG_NO = B.REG_NO
ORDER BY A.AGRMT_DT, A.AGRMT_TM

SELECT CARD_DTL_GRP_CD /* 카드코드 */ , CARD_DTL_GRP_CD || ' / ' || (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'CARD_DTL_GRP_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.CARD_DTL_GRP_CD) AS CARD_DTL_GRP , (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'CARD_STS_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.CARD_STS_CD) AS CARD_STS_CD /* 카드상태 */ , DECODE(A.CARD_NO,NULL,A.CARD_NO,SUBSTR(A.CARD_NO,1,LENGTH(A.CARD_NO)-8)||'****'||SUBSTR(A.CARD_NO,LENGTH(A.CARD_NO)-3,4)) AS CARD_NO /* 카드번호 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ISS_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ISS_DT /* 카드발급일자 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CARD_RREG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CARD_RREG_DT /* 카드등록일자 */ FROM MART_CARD_MST A
ORDER BY CARD_RREG_DT

SELECT CARD_DTL_GRP_CD /* 카드코드 */ , CARD_DTL_GRP_CD || ' / ' || (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'CARD_DTL_GRP_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.CARD_DTL_GRP_CD) AS CARD_DTL_GRP , (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'CARD_STS_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.CARD_STS_CD) AS CARD_STS_CD /* 카드상태 */ , DECODE(A.CARD_NO,NULL,A.CARD_NO,SUBSTR(A.CARD_NO,1,LENGTH(A.CARD_NO)-8)||'****'||SUBSTR(A.CARD_NO,LENGTH(A.CARD_NO)-3,4)) AS CARD_NO /* 카드번호 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ISS_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ISS_DT /* 카드발급일자 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CARD_RREG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CARD_RREG_DT /* 카드등록일자 */ FROM MART_CARD_MST A
ORDER BY CARD_RREG_DT
SELECT MBR_ID FROM MART_CLPHN_NO_DUP_INFO WHERE CLPHN_NO = (SELECT CLPHN_NO FROM MART_CLPHN_NO_DUP_INFO WHERE MBR_ID = #{mbrId})
SELECT MBR_ID FROM MART_EMAIL_ADDR_DUP_INFO WHERE EMAIL_ADDR = (SELECT EMAIL_ADDR FROM MART_EMAIL_ADDR_DUP_INFO WHERE MBR_ID = #{mbrId})
